title: (x) A Groovy Boutique - (similar to) One Stroke Script {Raph}

comments.content: Itâ€™s really difficult to nail a font like this, but if coming close is good enough, you can try slanting [One Stroke Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111043134/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/one-stroke-script/).
